### ðŸ“ˆ Observed vs Predicted DM

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(plotly)

x <- seq(20, 80, length.out = 20)
y <- x + rnorm(20, 0, 5)

plot_ly(x = ~x, y = ~y, type = "scatter", mode = "markers") %>%
  layout(
    title = "Observed vs Predicted DM",
    xaxis = list(title = "Observed DM (%)"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Predicted DM (%)")
  )
```
